about_the_game:
"

Devin Night Pack 173: Spacers

The unexplored regions of far off stars await the arrival of these stunning spacers! From laser sword wielding monks to hybrid canines and cyborg mercenaries, this pack has a full force of 44 tokens! For finicky fleet admirals in need of specially selected spacers, an additional 44 headless bodies and heads are also included for your designing delight!
